title: Transfer LP Tokens From Multisig to Gov Timelock
body:
Proposed by @monet-supply

### Background

When first becoming involved with the Pasta project, I transferred/donated some LP tokens to the [PastaDAO multisig](https://gnosis-safe.io/app/#/safes/0xB449dfE00aACf406eb442B22745A25430490FE1b/balances). These have been sitting idle, and there's no reason the multisig would need access to them. 

To increase decentralization, I propose transferring them to the on chain [governance timelock](https://etherscan.io/tokenholdings?a=0x9bb5a48878baa8bd884ecf6bdbc3812ca2bf9b9f).

### Proposal Actions

- Transfer 33.70650896 [Uniswap v2 PASTA/ETH LP](https://etherscan.io/token/0xe92346d9369fe03b735ed9bdeb6bdc2591b8227e?a=0xB449dfE00aACf406eb442B22745A25430490FE1b) from multisig to timelock
- Transfer 4,528.20915098 [Uniswap v2 PASTAv1/PASTAv2 LP](https://etherscan.io/token/0x012ff93bc177a03177074e29875397977eb07a67?a=0xB449dfE00aACf406eb442B22745A25430490FE1b) from multisig to timelock
- Transfer 244.94963364 [Uniswap v2 DAI/(PASTA/ETH LP) LP](https://etherscan.io/token/0x40476a0580f960cae11e182e9fe3b8326e61db14?a=0xB449dfE00aACf406eb442B22745A25430490FE1b) from multisig to timelock

### Vote Choices

**Yes** - Transfer all of the above listed tokens from the multisig to the on chain governance timelock.
**No** - Leave the tokens in the multisig.
author: 0x8d07D225a769b7Af3A923481E1FdF49180e6A265
